description:
This dashboard visualizes data exporter by the Prometheus OpenStack Exporter:
https://github.com/CanonicalLtd/prometheus-openstack-exporter

panels.content:
# Openstack dashboard: $cloud

* openstack data is cached for 5 minutes by default
* "Free IPs" are not owned by any tenant and available for allocation
* "Unused IPs" are owned by a tenant but not currently associated with an instance

title: Openstack clouds canon
